1�Oh my Gob! You're one of those adventurerurers, aren't ya?You got nothin' on me, �[man./lady.] I was just mindin' my own businesesess, lookin' for junk an' stuff.
1�Hey, watch out. You don't wanna fight me. I'll turn you into meat jerky!Wait, how about you and me be friends instead? Sound good?
1�I travel all over the world and hear lots of differererent stories. I even hear your stories. I can tell you one, if you want.
1�Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.

!?�Mikilulu! She's-- I've-- It's-- We've-- Toad!
1�Well, if it isn't Salwa-Molwa...
1�  and I were just about to set off in search of you.
1�However, it seems that you, in turn, have found us. All's well that ends well, I suppose.
1�Now, why don't you calm down and explain to us what has befallen you...starting with that unfortunate occurrence in Wajaom.
1�You see, you two were still sleeping when I recovered from the spell. I looked around to see if I couldn't spot the fiend that had put us in this predicament...
1�...being turned into a frog!
1�I tried to catch her so you could help break the curse, but for some reason, she started hopping off in the direction of Mamoo
k!�I knew   would take care of you, Professor, so I left you two there in the woods to chase after Mik
1�(You must have the eyes of a pugil,  . His account of the events is absolutely nothing like what you claim to have seen!)
i.�So it was just as you explained,  .
1�Anyway, I tried my best to catch my poor sweetheart, but she was just too slick and slimy.
1�And before I knew it, I found myself in the middle of the forest. Miki had stopped near a tree and I was just about to sneak up and grab her...
1�...when I saw her jump towards a shadow that was probably a terrible monster! It was a Poroggo, I tell you!
1�Boo-hah-hah�`...kupo!
1�Huh? Why aren't you jumping out of your skin in absolute terror?I would've died of fright, kupo!
1�Here, take this as a testament to your courage.Exchange it for the item your partner received so you can prove that you both reached the goal safely, kupo!
1�Return with the evidence of your success to the moogle in town. Handing over your partner's item will prove that you were both able to reach me, kupo!
1�Oh, and here's a picture of how your partner's face looked when I popped out of nowhere to scare you. You should hand this in at the same time, kupo!Kupupupu...
1�This place is crawling with nasties.You should probably head back to town so you can testify to your partner's bravery.
